nl.hanze.sjet.controller

Class ButtonFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.hanze.sjet.controller.ButtonFunctions

  • public class ButtonFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the button functions for the SimulatorView.
    Version:
    03-02-2015
    Author:
    Jan A. Germeraad

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ButtonFunctions(Simulator simulator)
      The constructor for the ButtonFunctions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFunctionOneStep(javax.swing.JButton button)
      Adds the function to do one step to a specific button.
      void addFunctionPause(javax.swing.JButton button)
      Switches the Simulator's suspended boolean to true if the boolean was false.

      Adds the 'reset' function to specified button.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ButtonFunctions

        public ButtonFunctions(Simulator simulator)
        The constructor for the ButtonFunctions.
        Parameters:
        simulator - The simulator in which the button functions operate.

    • Method Detail

      • addFunctionOneStep

        public void addFunctionOneStep(javax.swing.JButton button)
        Adds the function to do one step to a specific button. The button won't do anything if the Simulator's suspended boolean is false.
        Parameters:
        button - The button which uses the function.

      • addFunctionRun

        public void addFunctionRun(javax.swing.JButton button)
        Add the 'run' function to the specified button. The button starts the Simulator thread if the Simulator's started boolean is set to false and resumes the thread when the started boolean is set to true and the suspended boolean is set to true.
        Parameters:
        button - The button which uses the function.

      • addFunctionPause

        public void addFunctionPause(javax.swing.JButton button)
        Switches the Simulator's suspended boolean to true if the boolean was false.
        Parameters:
        button - The button which uses the function.

      • addFunctionReset

        public void addFunctionReset(javax.swing.JButton button)
        Adds the 'reset' function to specified button. If the thread was paused, the Simulator is reset. Otherwise this button should do nothing.
        Parameters:
        button - The button which uses the function.
